casebody.data:
No. 6,

Misc.

Bryant v. Ohio. Petitioner pro se. Mathias H. Heck and Herbert M. Jacobson for respondent.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Ohio denied in the light of the representation made by respondent in its brief in opposition that “Petitioner may at this time perfect an appeal to the Supreme Court of Ohio in forma pauperis, which appeal will be heard by that Court.”
